Privacy Policy

The staff at HipsterTron do not intend to give your information away to any third parties or send you any emails that you have not requested.

If you wish to unsubscribe from HipsterTron, you may do so at any time (check your HipsterTron emails).

We do not intend to change our privacy policy for the foreseeable future (as of 09/01/14). However, if it does change we will send you a notification.
